snapplot

snapplot provides a suite of functions for graphing SNAP data sets. It supports other SNAPverse packages, namely snapstat. It is recommended to use snapstat directly when working with SNAP data for graphing and analysis.

Installation

You can install snapplot from github with:

# install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github("leonawicz/snapplot")
